last_episode_to_air.overview: Everything went just as Weisheit planned and every Magus has ceased functioning. However, Noir is the only Magus unaffected due to her unique origins. Now all hope rests on her shoulders. The time has come for Kanata and Noir to face off against Weisheit in their final battle.
last_episode_to_air.name: My Name is... Noir / Drifters

name: Synduality Noir
overview: The year is 2242. Kanata wants to be a Drifter and meets Noir, who is a dud Magus with no memories. However, because Noir excels in battle against the Enders, Kanata partners with her and discovers exactly what it takes to be a Drifter.

episodes.name: My Name Is...
episodes.overview: Kanata and Tokio discover a Magus with no memories; Rock Town is in danger when the Enders attack.

episodes.name: My Master
episodes.overview: Kanata returns to the ruins where he found Noir to uncover the truth about her past; Range meets Ciel, a Magus, after attempting to lure Noir away from town.

episodes.name: Behind the Mask
episodes.overview: Kanata becomes Noir's master; Tokio takes Kanata to Desire Nest to turn him into a real man.

episodes.name: Wild Daisy
episodes.overview: Kanata battles Enders without Noir to become stronger; he is saved by Claudia and Flamme, who have a request for him.

episodes.name: Drifting the Maze
episodes.overview: To become a stronger Drifter, Kanata must strengthen his bond with his Magus; Kanata makes his way to the Fes maze with Noir; a group attacking Amasian Type Zero Magus and their Drifters comes to Tokio's attention.

episodes.name: Dice Is Cast
episodes.overview: After getting caught in the rain, Kanata and Tokio seek shelter in Baccarat Nest, where they run into Ciel.

episodes.name: My Dear...
episodes.overview: Kanata wants to learn more about Noir's past.

episodes.name: Pure Dream
episodes.overview: Kanata invites Ellie to Satellite Aqua. Thinking it is a date, Ellie finds the whole gang there.

episodes.name: Legendary Hero
episodes.overview: On the way to Traders Nest, Kanata witnesses a lone Drifter walking in the rain.

episodes.name: Drifters' Pride
episodes.overview: Kanata investigates who is behind the destruction of the Nests surrounding Rock Town.

episodes.name: Storm of A.I.
episodes.overview: Drifters from nearby Nests rush to Rock Town's aid as they prepare to face off against the Silver Storm. Meanwhile, the mysterious group who are after Noir take advantage of the chaos and order Ciel to eliminate Kanata. As the battle drags on, the Drifters start to lose all hope of survival.

episodes.name: Mirage of the Ideal
episodes.overview: It is the final leg in the battle against the Silver Storm. No one is left unscathed and though Kanata refuses to give up, even the upgraded DAISYOGRE is desperately struggling. In this fight to the death, Noir's worries reach a climax and she undergoes a transformation.

episodes.name: Double Cast
episodes.overview: A few days have passed since the heated battle against Silver Storm, but Noir still has not returned to her normal self after transforming into Mystere. Kanata takes Mystere to places where he and Noir shared memories in the hopes it will help wake Noir.

episodes.name: Mysterious Journey
episodes.overview: Mystere tells Kanata that Histoire really does exist. As proof, she and her former master had once made contact with Histoire's network during their travels. However, if Kanata is ever going to make it to Histoire, he will need to undergo some training.

episodes.name: Duel of Fates
episodes.overview: Kanata heads to nearby Carthago, which supposedly has an old spaceport, in his search for clues to the legendary Histoire. He tries to gain access, but is suddenly attacked. When he confronts the attackers, Kanata is challenged to a duel for his Magus.

episodes.name: Noir Rain
episodes.overview: Noir learns her personality may disappear once Mystere's self-repair sequence is completed. She accepts her fate, believing Kanata is better served with Mystere at his side. Hearts misalign as Kanata is unaware of her decision. As a final gesture, Noir decides to make him a meal.

episodes.name: Greyish Zone
episodes.overview: Noir's reckless behavior causes both her and Mystere to stop functioning. When neither will wake up, Kanata turns to Alba for help. However, Alba tells Kanata he will need another Type Zero Magus in order to save them. There might be one in the ruins of Amasia, so Kanata and Ciel set out to find it.

episodes.name: Beyond the Sky
episodes.overview: Betrayed by a trusted ally, Kanata is taken prisoner. To make matters worse, two more of his friends are seen standing among Ideal's members. With a final twist of the proverbial knife, Weisheit reveals a shocking past.

episodes.name: Body Double
episodes.overview: Ellie comes looking for Kanata, fearing for his safety. She finds him in a state of shock, cradling a motionless Ciel and blaming himself. Time is running out for Noir and Mystere, but he still cannot make a choice. Amidst a heated debate, Kanata must come to a decision.

episodes.name: Their Narratives
episodes.overview: Pascale left a message detailing Noir and Mystere's past. It was a story that began when they first made contact with Histoire. Meanwhile, Macht reminisces about the time he entered into his contract with Schnee...

episodes.name: Your Song
episodes.overview: With the battle against Ideal on the horizon, Kanata is busy enhancing DAISYOGRE ALTER. Meanwhile, Noir still cannot accept that Ciel was the one who saved her. Wandering around, she comes across one of Ciel's fans. As the two reminisce over Ciel's songs, Noir tells Kanata she wants to try singing.

episodes.name: Gravity Coffin
episodes.overview: With Maria's rocket completed, Kanata can finally travel to Histoire. However, Ideal has other ideas and tries to stop him. It is open warfare as Weisheit orders Macht to steal Mystere from under Kanata's nose. The battle between the Drifters of Rock Town and Ideal starts with a massive bang.

episodes.name: Over the Limit
episodes.overview: Kanata decides to chase Weisheit down in the last remaining rocket to get Mystere back. He and Noir say their goodbyes to the people of Rock Town before finally arriving at Histoire, where Weisheit is eagerly waiting for them.

episodes.name: My Name is... Noir / Drifters
episodes.overview: Everything went just as Weisheit planned and every Magus has ceased functioning. However, Noir is the only Magus unaffected due to her unique origins. Now all hope rests on her shoulders. The time has come for Kanata and Noir to face off against Weisheit in their final battle.
